trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents the standard input, output, and error streams for console applications.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the background color of the console.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A value that specifies the background color of the console; that is, the color that appears behind each character.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxx xx$ xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Plays the sound of a beep through the console speaker.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This method was executed on a server, such as SQL Server, that does not permit access to a user interface.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxx$ xxxx xx XXX Xxxxxx$ xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Plays the sound of a beep of a specified frequency and duration through the console speaker.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The frequency of the beep, ranging from 37 to 32767 hertz.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx$ xxxxxxx xxxx 00 xx 00000 xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The duration of the beep measured in milliseconds.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
frequency is less than 37 or more than 32767 hertz.

-or-

duration is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx 00 xx xxxx xxxx 00000 xxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This method was executed on a server, such as SQL Server, that does not permit access to the console.

\n

\n

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current height, in rows, of the buffer area.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the width of the buffer area.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current width, in columns, of the buffer area.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the CAPS LOCK keyboard toggle is turned on or turned off.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx XXXX XXXX xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if CAPS LOCK is turned on; false if CAPS LOCK is turned off.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx XXXX XXXX xx xxxxxx xx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx XXXX XXXX xx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Clears the console buffer and corresponding console window of display information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the column position of the cursor within the buffer area.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current position, in columns, of the cursor.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the height of the cursor within a character cell.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The size of the cursor expressed as a percentage of the height of a character cell.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The property value ranges from 1 to 100.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx 0 xx 000.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value specified in a set operation is less than 1 or greater than 100.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 000.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The user does not have permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

trans-unit.source:

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

trans-unit.source:

The encoding used to read console input.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether the error output stream has been redirected from the standard error stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if error output is redirected; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if a key press is available; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx x xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Standard input is redirected to a file instead of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The next character from the input stream, or negative one (-1) if there are currently no more characters to be read.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The pressed key is displayed in the console window.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.

\n

trans-unit.source: true to not display the pressed key; otherwise, false.

\n

\n

\n

\n

In a set operation, the specified title is null.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the leftmost position of the console window area relative to the screen buffer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The leftmost console window position measured in columns.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the top position of the console window area relative to the screen buffer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The uppermost console window position measured in rows.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes the text representation of the specified Boolean value to the standard output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx Xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes the specified Unicode character value to the standard output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes the specified array of Unicode characters to the standard output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Writes the specified subarray of Unicode characters to the standard output stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nindex plus count specify a position that is not within buffer.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx $xx$xxxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n
